resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103550</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103550</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202808</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Singing the Song of Life</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Singen des Lieds des Lebens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chant de la chanson de la vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cantando a canção da vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Canto della canzone di vita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τραγούδι του τραγουδιού της ζωής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cantar la canción de la vida</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson requires students to use their reading, comprehension, and analysis skills to analyze a poem and respond creatively to the selection.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion benötigt Kursteilnehmer, ihren 
Messwert, Erfassen und Analyse Fähigkeiten zu verwenden, um ein 
Gedicht zu analysieren und auf die Auswahl kreativ zu reagieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon exige des étudiants d'employer leur 
lecture, compréhension, et qualifications d'analyse pour analyser une
poésie et pour répondre créativement à la sélection.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição requer estudantes usar suas leitura, 
compreensão, e habilidades da análise analisar um poema e responder 
creativamente à seleção.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione richiede agli allievi di usare la 
loro lettura, comprensione ed abilità di analisi per analizzare un 
poem e per rispondere creativamente alla selezione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα απαιτεί τους σπουδαστές για να 
χρησιμοποιήσει την ανάγνωση, την κατανόηση, και τις δεξιότητες 
ανάλυσής τους για να αναλύσει ένα ποίημα και να αποκριθεί 
δημιουργικά στην επιλογή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección requiere a estudiantes utilizar su 
lectura, comprensión, y habilidades del análisis para analizar un 
poema y para responder creativo a la selección.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ANGELA TAYLOR
FN:ANGELA TAYLOR
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202808</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103550</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/singing-the-song-of-life</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
